title: Did U.S. Taxpayers Pay Over $90 Billion More Under Trump’s Tax Law?
subtitle: The IRS collected $93 billion more from taxpayers in fiscal year 2018 than 2017, but that doesn't mean it's a harbinger of things to come.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: In 2018, American taxpayers paid over $90 billion more under the Trump administration's tax law than they did the previous year.
